description: The IMMUNE table contains data for immunizations ordered through clinical system. May also contain information on immunizations as reported by patient, but not ordered/administered via clinical system;  Fields in this table are noadd- single items in database. If an immunization record is edited/changed, that record will be re-extracted and reflect the updated values.

columns.name: IMMUNE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the immunization record in your system production system.

columns.name: IMMUNZATN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the immunization record that corresponds to the type of immunization given to this patient.

columns.name: IMMUNZATN_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the immunization.

columns.name: IMMUNE_DATE
columns.description: The date the immunization was administered in calendar format.

columns.name: DOSE
columns.description: The immunization dosage.

columns.name: ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the route of the immunization, such as oral, intramuscular, or intradermal.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the location of the injection, if appropriate. For example, left gluteus or right deltoid.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MFG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the manufacturer of this vaccine.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LOT
columns.description: The lot number of the vaccine.

columns.name: EXP_DATE
columns.description: The date the immunization is next due, if in a series. This is manually established by the user, and not automatically calculated like an HM or BPA.

columns.name: GIVEN_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who administered the immunization. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who ordered the immunization. This ID may be encrypted.  NOTE: If an immunization record is edited/updated, this will show the most recent change user ID.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the immunization was recorded in the patientï¿½s chart in calendar format. NOTE: If an immunization record is edited/updated, this will show the most recent change date.

columns.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: Date upon which this immunization expires

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ADMIN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value indicating the source of verification of external administration of immunization, e.g. patient reported, WIR reported, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient reported


Confirmed


MyChart Entered


Auto Reconciled From Outside Source

columns.name: VIS_DATE_TEXT
columns.description: The date on the vaccine information statement. Note that this is a free text field in the application, so data will not be in standard datetime format.

columns.name: DEFER_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value indicating the reason for deferring the immunization, e.g. patient refused, contraindication, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Refused


Contraindication

columns.name: MED_ADMIN_COMMENT
columns.description: Free text comment regarding the administration of this immunization

columns.name: PHYSICAL_SITE
columns.description: Item that stores the physical location where the immunization was administered like some specific hospital

columns.name: IMM_PRODUCT
columns.description: Item which stores the product of the immunization. Products are usually related to the lot number.

columns.name: IMMUNIZATION_TIME
columns.description: Column that stores the time when a given immunization was administered.

columns.name: NDC_NUM_ID
columns.description: Store the NDC number ID associated with the administration

columns.name: NDC_NUM_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_DCS_ID
columns.description: Document ID for the immunization. This is the information stored when the e-sign information is selected.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: Order ID for immunization ordered.

columns.name: IMM_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: Stores answers for immunization questions.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with "Given" if the immunization has been administered, "Deleted" if the immunization has been deleted from the administration history, "Incomplete" if the item has been ordered but not administered and a status of "Deferred" if the immunization has been deferred.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Given


Deleted


Incomplete


Deferred


Refused


Partially Administered


Invalid

columns.name: IMM_MAR_ADMIN_LINE
columns.description: The line number in the linked order record's immunization link item (I ORD 11270) which references this immunization record ID.

columns.name: IMM_CHARGE_REC_ID
columns.description: This column contains the UCL (Universal Charge Line) record ID for the immunization charge.

columns.name: IMM_CSN
columns.description: This column contains the CSN (contact serial number) for the immunization.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID
columns.description: This column contains the immunization's external ID, which is populated by the interface.  The external ID is the external system's identifier for the immunization.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_SYSTEM
columns.description: This column contains the name or ID of the third party system that the immunization data came from.  This item is only populated by custom import specifications.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENT_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the last instant of update of the immunization problem list (LPL) record.

columns.name: IMM_HISTORIC_ADM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the immunization administration is a historical administration.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: IMMNZTN_DUALSIGN_ID
columns.description: The user who performed the second user verification on the immunization.

columns.name: IMM_DUALSIGNINSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which this immunization was verified by the second user.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_DOSE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Immunization dose amount.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Immunization dose unit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMM_DEL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value indicating the reason for deleting or canceling the immunization.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMM_SCANNED_BARCODE
columns.description: The raw data captured during immunization barcode scanning.

columns.name: ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the date and time that the immunization administration data was last updated. If the exact time is not known, a date may be contained in ENTRY_DATE instead.

columns.name: IMM_PRODUCT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The brand name associated with the vaccination administration, stored as a category value from a defined set of products.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMM_DEFER_DUR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Each category value represents a different time scale of deferral for a vaccine administration deferral (e.g. "brief", "permanent", etc...). This item does NOT store the specific length of time the vaccine was deferred.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMM_REG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current administration's overall status according to an external Immunization Registry.

columns.name: IMM_LST_REGINST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Last instant in which the overall registry status from an Immunization Registry was updated for a vaccine administration problem list  (LPL)record.

columns.name: IMM_MAR_ADM_INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: Link to the INP record that may hold the administrations data.

columns.name: IMM_LOT_NUM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the record ID of the lot(LOT) used for immunization administration.
